remarks: ` _e ` is transcendental.  Section *5 of [Juillerat] p. 11 can be used as a reference for this proof.  In this lemma, a large enough prime ` p ` is chosen: it will be used by subsequent lemmas.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
